contest-event.event-date:
April 24, 1988 D Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section B)
Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section B) 20 Hymn & Own Choice Test Piece Contest Holme Valley Brass Band Contest holme-valley-brass-band-contest-section-b
Civic Hall, Holmfirth Prizes - 1st £80 and shield, 2nd £45 and cup, 3rd £35 and cup, 4th £25. March contest - 1st(£15 and cup) West Yorkshire Police, 2nd(£10) Hinchliffe Mill. 7 bands competed.
April 6, 2012, 8:35 a.m. June 28, 2016, 10:36 a.m.
1 West Yorkshire Police Band M. Leeson Stantonbury Festival
2 Hinchliffe Mill Band R. Broadhead Promenade
3 Linthwaite Silver Band John Iredale Labour and Love
4 Uppermill Band Harold Robinson Petite Suite de Ballet
Unknown Result Emley Brass Band S. Bennet Stantonbury Festival
Unknown Result Shepley A. Williams Voices of Youth
Unknown Result Honley Silver Band Russell Gray Stantonbury Festival
Withdrawn Marsden Silver Prize Band Ted Tooley
Withdrawn Slaithwaite Band Peter Wadsworth
